title: Competition for DMU students to design Richard III hologram (De Montfort University)
text: ( Source : De Montfort University ) Could YOU help design a hologram of Richard III for DMU 's Heritage Centre ? Students are being asked for their ideas for a major new heritage project - to create a hologram of Richard III in the place where
